entry.title: Tyaagi - Rajnikanth, Mithun Chakraborty
entry.content:
![Tyaagi - Rajnikanth, Mithun Chakraborty](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/YSTmOIwJrQo/hqdefault.jpg =640x380)
![Tyaagi - Rajnikanth, Mithun Chakraborty](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/YSTmOIwJrQo/1.jpg =1580x150)
![Tyaagi - Rajnikanth, Mithun Chakraborty](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/YSTmOIwJrQo/2.jpg =1580x150)
![Tyaagi - Rajnikanth, Mithun Chakraborty](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/YSTmOIwJrQo/3.jpg =1580x150)

Jagdish (Mithun Chakraborty) lives a simple and honest life with his wife Savitri. Jagdish’s co-workers and cruel parents prey on his innocence and take advantage of him. Jagdish is tormented by corruption and atrocities around him and he transforms himself into a man of absolute power. He starts moonlighting as a vigilante named Alfred to fight crime and serve justice. A man named Ranjit sets his eyes on Savitri and schemes devious plans to break her marriage. What price will Jagdish pay to vanquish evil as Alfred? Can he save his wife before it’s too late?

Watch ‘Tabaahi The Destroyer’ (1999). One of Mithun Chakraborty superhit movies.

entry.title: Mera Rakshak
entry.content:
![Mera Rakshak](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/yS7WXMyKHs0/hqdefault.jpg =640x380)
![Mera Rakshak](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/yS7WXMyKHs0/1.jpg =1580x150)
![Mera Rakshak](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/yS7WXMyKHs0/2.jpg =1580x150)
![Mera Rakshak](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/yS7WXMyKHs0/3.jpg =1580x150)

Orphaned Bijli works on a farm owned by widowed, wealthy and arrogant Avinash Rai. She has no one to call her own save and except for her pet goat, Ramu, who often comes to protect her from molesters like Mangal. She then meets with Vijay Rai, both fall in love and decide to get married much to the chagrin of Avinash who asks Vijay to leave. The couple and Ramu re-locate to a distant farmhouse where they live a harmonious lifestyle. Avinash then arranges Radha’s (his daughter) marriage and does not invite Vijay, but Vijay and Bijli show up, and what they witness during this ceremony will change their lives forever.

entry.title: Ahankaar
entry.content:
![Ahankaar](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/X-iJ1BGMWQw/hqdefault.jpg =640x380)
![Ahankaar](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/X-iJ1BGMWQw/1.jpg =1580x150)
![Ahankaar](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/X-iJ1BGMWQw/2.jpg =1580x150)
![Ahankaar](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/X-iJ1BGMWQw/3.jpg =1580x150)

“Prabhat (Mithun Chakraborty) is simple person. He has an alcoholic father and a loving stepbrother (Mohnish Behl). Prabhat gets promoted at work by unveiling his manager’s plots. However he gives his position to his stepbrother. The manager’s daughter traps Mohnish Behl in love and marries into the family. Does she wish to avenge her father’s insult or wishes to love Mohnish Behel? Watch this film to know more.

entry.title: Aar Paar
entry.content:
![Aar Paar](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/z6lQSI6OQfQ/hqdefault.jpg =640x380)
![Aar Paar](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/z6lQSI6OQfQ/1.jpg =1580x150)
![Aar Paar](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/z6lQSI6OQfQ/2.jpg =1580x150)
![Aar Paar](https://i1.ytimg.com/vi/z6lQSI6OQfQ/3.jpg =1580x150)

Ghanshyam (Mithun Chakraborty) lives in a small coastal town of Raipur, where he makes a living as a fisherman. He sells his sells his catch to a man named Mahesh Manna who gives him half the price which he has to bear as there is no other buyer in the village. Mahesh is greedy, lecherous, and crooked and has been swindling money from Ghanshyam. In the midst of sorrows, a sweet romance blossoms between Ghanshyam and the village beauty, Kamli. But Mahesh cannot stand their love as he wants to make Kamli his own. He tries his best to impress Kamli but Kamli pays no heed as she is lost in the love of Ghanshyam. A jelous Mahesh takes a vow to finish Ghanshyam and plots a lethal plan to do so. Can Ghanshyam escape the odds stacked against him?
